-- 계약번호, 접수일자, 현장명, 신청 담당자, 사양서 첨부, 고철 낙찰업체, 낙찰가, 수주일, 프로젝트번호, 현장명, 영업담당자, 착공일, 현장 설치 PM, 고철 인계일(설치), 세금계산서 발행일(회계), 비고 SELECT A.MANDT -- 클라이언트 , A.QTNUM -- 계약번호 , KK.REDDT -- 접수일자 , A.GSNAM -- 공사명 , KK.REQMAN_NM -- 신청담당자 , LEFT(LISTAGG( CASE WHEN SPEC.ZUSE = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.ZUSE END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE1 = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.TYPE1 END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.ZACAPA = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.ZACAPA END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE2 = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.TYPE2 END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE3 = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.TYPE3 END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.ZLEN = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.ZLEN END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.ZOPN = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.ZOPN END || ',' ),length(LISTAGG( CASE WHEN SPEC.ZUSE = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.ZUSE END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE1 = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.TYPE1 END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.ZACAPA = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.ZACAPA END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE2 = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.TYPE2 END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE3 = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.TYPE3 END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.ZLEN = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.ZLEN END ||'-'|| CASE WHEN SPEC.ZOPN = '' THEN '' ELSE SPEC.ZOPN END || ',' )) - 1 ) AS SPEC /* , ' '|| LISTAGG( CASE WHEN SPEC.GTYPE = '' THEN '' ELSE '기종:' || SPEC.GTYPE END || CASE WHEN SPEC.ZUSE = '' THEN '' ELSE ' 용도:' || SPEC.ZUSE END || CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE1 = '' THEN '' ELSE ' 인승폭:' || SPEC.TYPE1 END || CASE WHEN SPEC.ZACAPA = '' THEN '' ELSE ' 용량:' || SPEC.ZACAPA END || CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE2 = '' THEN '' ELSE ' 속도:' || SPEC.TYPE2 END || CASE WHEN SPEC.TYPE3 = '' THEN '' ELSE ' 층수각도:' || SPEC.TYPE3 END || CASE WHEN SPEC.ZLEN = '' THEN '' ELSE ' 정지층수/층고:' || SPEC.ZLEN END || CASE WHEN SPEC.ZOPN = '' THEN '' ELSE ' DOOR개페길이:' || SPEC.ZOPN END || CASE WHEN CHAR(SPEC.ZNUMBER) = '' THEN '' ELSE ' 대수:' || SPEC.ZNUMBER END || ' ' ) AS SPEC -- 사양서 첨부 /* ,' '|| LISTAGG('기종 : ' || SPEC.GTYPE ||' 용도 : ' || SPEC.ZUSE ||' 인승폭 : ' || SPEC.TYPE1 ||' 용량 : ' || SPEC.ZACAPA ||' 속도 : ' || SPEC.TYPE2 ||' 층수각도 : ' || SPEC.TYPE3 ||' 정지층수/층고 : ' || SPEC.ZLEN ||' DOOR개페길이 : ' || SPEC.ZOPN ||' 대수 : ' || SPEC.ZNUMBER || ' ') AS SPEC -- 사양서 첨부 */ */ , KK.BIDCOP -- 고철 낙찰업체 , BD.NAME1 AS BIDCOP_NM -- 고철 낙찰업체 이름 , kk.BIDPRC -- 낙찰가 , A.BSTDK -- 수주일 , kk.METGUBUN -- 고철처리 유형 , '' AS BID_CONT_YN -- 낙찰업체 계약서 발송여부 , A.VBELN -- 프로젝트번호 , A.GSNAM AS GSNAM2 -- 공사명 , A.ZKUNNR -- 영업사원 , A.ZKUNNR_NM -- 영업 담당자명 , A.ZZDAT01 -- 착공일 , A.ZZTEAMJ AS CONS_PM -- 현장 설치 PM , KK.METDELDT -- 고철 인계일 , KK.TAXDT -- 세금계산서 발행일 , A.QTSER -- 견적차수 , A.QTDAT -- 견적일 , '' AS CHECK , ZU.USERMAIL AS REGMAIL , KK.ZRMMK /* , A.SPART -- 제품군 , A.QTGBN -- 견적구분 , A.ZBDTYP -- 건물용도 , A.VKBUR -- 사업장 , A.VKGRP -- 영업그룹 , Z.USERTELE AS TEL -- 2012.12.14. 전화번호 추가 , Z.USERFAXN AS FAX -- 2012.12.17. 팩스번호 추가 , Z.USERMBPN AS CEL -- 2012.12.17. 휴대폰번호 추가 , Z.USERMAIL AS MAIL -- 이메일주소 */ FROM
( SELECT T.MANDT , T.QTNUM , MAX(T.QTSER) QTSER FROM ( SELECT R.MANDT , R.QTNUM , R.QTSER , R.QTSEQ , R.PRH , R.PRD , R.ETCH , R.ETCM , R.ZRMK -- ,(SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = R.MANDT AND LANG = 'ko' AND CODE1 = 'SD121' AND CTEXT2 = R.PRH ) AS CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1046 AS Z1046 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZSDT1048 R ON Z1046.MANDT = R.MANDT AND Z1046.QTNUM = R.QTNUM AND Z1046.QTSER = R.QTSER INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT981 KK ON R.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND R.QTNUM = KK.QTNUM AND R.QTSER = KK.QTSER WHERE 1 = 1 AND Z1046.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND Z1046.QTNUM = #QTNUM#
AND Z1046.GSNAM LIKE '%'||#GSNAM#||'%'
--BETWEEN '20200402' AND '20200404' AND R.PRH = 'EL_DREUSE' AND R.PRD = 'Y' AND R.MANDT = #G_MANDT# WITH UR ) T GROUP BY T.MANDT, T.QTNUM ) DST INNER JOIN ( SELECT C.MANDT, C.QTNUM , C.QTSER , C.QTDAT , C.ZKUNNR , C.GSNAM , C.VBELN ,C.BSTDK -- 수주일 ,C.ZZDAT01 -- 착공일 --,M3.NAMET AS ZZTEAMJ ,C.POSID_1 , CASE CAST('ko' AS VARCHAR(2)) WHEN 'ko' THEN D.NAME1 ELSE D.NAME2 END AS ZKUNNR_NM , M22.NAMET AS ZZTEAMJ FROM ( SELECT z1046.MANDT , z1046.QTNUM , z1046.QTSER , z1046.QTDAT , z1046.ZKUNNR , GSNAM , z1046.VBELN ,AK.BSTDK -- 수주일 ,MAX(M3.ZZDAT01) ZZDAT01 -- 착공일 --,M3.NAMET AS ZZTEAMJ ,MAX(M3.POSID_1) POSID_1 FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1046 as z1046 -- 견적 Header inner join saphee.zsdt0167 as z0167 on z1046.mandt=z0167.mandt and z1046.qtnum=z0167.qtnum and z0167.tquot='' inner join saphee.zsdt1091 as z1091 on z1046.mandt=z1091.mandt and z1046.qtnum=z1091.qtnum and z1046.qtser=z1091.qtser INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT981 KK ON z1091.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND z1091.QTNUM = KK.QTNUM AND z1091.QTSER = KK.QTSER LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS M2 ON z1046.MANDT = M2.MANDT AND z1046.VBELN = M2.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS AK ON M2.MANDT=AK.MANDT AND M2.POSID=AK.ZZPJT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS M3 ON M2.MANDT = M3.MANDT AND M2.POSID = M3.POSID WHERE z1046.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND z1046.qtser = substr(trim(z1046.qtser),1) /* key index를 적용시키기위함(견적순번을 적용)*/ --AND QTDAT BETWEEN '20200401' AND '20200404'
AND Z1046.QTNUM = #QTNUM#
AND Z1046.GSNAM LIKE '%'||#GSNAM#||'%'
--AND VKBUR = '00'
GROUP BY z1046.MANDT, z1046.QTNUM , z1046.QTSER , QTDAT , z1046.ZKUNNR, z1046.KUNNR, GSNAM, z1046.VBELN, AK.BSTDK--, M3.NAMET WITH UR ) C LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE ( SELECT KUNNR, NAME1, NAME2 FROM SAPHEE.KNA1 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND KUNNR = C.ZKUNNR ) D ON C.ZKUNNR = D.KUNNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS M22 ON C.MANDT = M22.MANDT AND C.VBELN = M22.POSID AND C.POSID_1 = M22.POSID_1 ) A ON DST.MANDT = A.MANDT AND DST.QTNUM = A.QTNUM AND DST.QTSER = A.QTSER LEFT JOIN TABLE ( SELECT USERNUMB AS USER_ID, USERNAME AS USER_NAME, USERTELE , USERFAXN, USERMBPN, USERMAIL FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF U WHERE U.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = SUBSTR(A.ZKUNNR, 2,7) ) Z ON SUBSTR(A.ZKUNNR, 2,7) = Z.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT981 KK ON DST.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND DST.QTNUM = KK.QTNUM AND DST.QTSER = KK.QTSER LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 BD ON KK.MANDT = BD.MANDT AND KK.BIDCOP = BD.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZSDT1047 AS SPEC ON DST.MANDT = SPEC.MANDT AND DST.QTNUM = SPEC.QTNUM AND DST.QTSER = SPEC.QTSER LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS ZU ON KK.REQMAN = ZU.USERNUMB AND ZU.MANDT = #G_MANDT# GROUP BY A.MANDT -- 클라이언트 , A.QTNUM -- 계약번호 , KK.REDDT -- 접수일자 , A.GSNAM -- 공사명 , KK.REQMAN_NM -- 신청담당자 , KK.BIDCOP -- 고철 낙찰업체 , BD.NAME1 -- 고철 낙찰업체 이름 , kk.BIDPRC -- 낙찰가 , A.BSTDK -- 수주일 , kk.METGUBUN -- 고철처리 유형 , A.VBELN -- 프로젝트번호 , A.GSNAM -- 공사명 , A.ZKUNNR -- 영업사원 , A.ZKUNNR_NM -- 영업 담당자명 , A.ZZDAT01 -- 착공일 , KK.METDELDT -- 고철 인계일 , KK.TAXDT -- 세금계산서 발행일 , A.QTSER -- 견적차수 , A.QTDAT -- 견적일 , A.ZZTEAMJ , ZU.USERMAIL , KK.ZRMMK ORDER BY A.QTNUM FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
